experience.title: Scour Depth Prediction - Research Project
experience.description: • Explored around 200+ research papers to fetch over 3000 data points for Scour depth cases of steady currents and waves• Extracted significant features out of all given features using Pearson corr. matrix, chi-squared methods and feature_importance tool of XGBoost    Regressor• Employed regression models such as Gradient Boost, XGBoost, RF and LightGBM followed by ensemble method of Voting Regressor• Developed a public-use website using flask which enables an user to input the significant features consecutively estimating the scour depth as an output
experience.description_html: • Explored around 200+ research papers to fetch over 3000 data points for Scour depth cases of steady currents and waves• Extracted significant features out of all given features using Pearson corr. matrix, chi-squared methods and feature_importance tool of XGBoost  Regressor• Employed regression models such as Gradient Boost, XGBoost, RF and LightGBM followed by ensemble method of Voting Regressor• Developed a public-use website using flask which enables an user to input the significant features consecutively estimating the scour depth as an output
